# Snow Removal Work on Buildings Accesses
## Project No. VR552410_80667

### Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking qualified contractors to perform snow removal work on buildings accesses at CFB Garrison Valcartier in Quebec. The project involves providing Labour, Materials, Supervision, and Equipment necessary for snow removal on pedestrian and vehicular traffic areas, building accesses, and infrastructures.

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** MX-42849707282
* **Solicitation Number:** VR552410_80667
* **Publication Date:** August 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 11, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** October 11, 2023

### Contractor Requirements

Bidders must be able to provide the estimated cost of $1,920,000 for a three-year period, with the possibility of two additional one-year extensions (possible value of $3,200,000).

### Tender Documents

Tender documents can be ordered from MERX and are available on their website or by calling 1 (800) 964-MERX (6379). Amendment documents should be obtained from MERX, as amendments from other sources may not be the latest.

### Site Visit

A site visit has been arranged for:

* **Date:** September 6, 2023
* **Time:** 13:30, Local Time
* **Location:** Garrison Valcartier, Rue de la Victoire, Building VC72, Room 104, Courcelette (QC) G0A 4Z0

### Procurement Details

This procurement is being conducted in accordance with the requirements set out in:

* Chapter Five of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Chapter Nineteen of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* The World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA)
